gt_text: 'エスプレッソ – $3', 'オーツミルクラテ – $5.50', 'パンプキンコールドブリュー – $4.75', '朝食ブリトー（ベジタリアン） – $6.25', 'ベーグル＋クリームチーズ – $3.25', 'エスプレッソ追加 – $0.75', '日替わりのシングルオリジン豆についてお気軽にお尋ねください！', 'Wi-Fiはありません — 会話を楽しんでください！', 'スタンプカードあります — 10杯目は無料', '期間限定の焼きマシュマロモカをお試しください', 'バリスタのおすすめ ☕ 本日の一杯：カルダモンカプチーノ'
juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   Cozy, modern coffee shop interior
*   Coffee shop counter
*   Large blackboard wall (behind counter)
*   Hand-drawn chalk menus (on blackboard wall)
*   Legible, visually busy chalk menu area (on blackboard)
*   Chalk text: "浓缩咖啡 – $3" (on menu)
*   Chalk text: "燕麦奶拿铁 – $5.50" (on menu)
*   Chalk text: "南瓜冷萃咖啡 – $4.75" (on menu)
*   Chalk text: "早餐卷饼（素） – $6.25" (on menu)
*   Chalk text: "百吉饼配奶油奶酪 – $3.25" (on menu)
*   Chalk text: "加一份浓缩 – $0.75" (on menu)
*   Chalk text: "欢迎咨询我们轮换的单一产地咖啡豆！" (on menu)
*   Chalk text: "没有WiFi — 请彼此交谈！" (on menu)
*   Chalk text: "提供集点卡 — 第十杯免费" (on menu)
*   Chalk text: "尝试限时供应的烤棉花糖摩卡" (on menu)
*   Chalk text: "咖啡师推荐 ☕ 今日精选：豆蔻卡布奇诺" (on menu, including emoji)
*   Chalkboard menu sections
*   Small chalk illustrations of coffee cups (on chalkboard menu)
*   Small chalk illustrations of coffee beans (on chalkboard menu)
*   Varied chalk handwriting (neat and scribbled, on chalkboard menu)
*   Man (foreground, in focus, close to camera)
*   Woman (foreground, in focus, close to camera)
*   Man and woman side-by-side
*   Man squinting (at menu)
*   Woman squinting (at menu)
*   Wallet (held by man)
*   Dog leash (held by woman)
*   Partially visible dog (slightly off-frame, on leash)
*   Man's head tilted up (towards chalkboard)
*   Woman's head tilted up (towards chalkboard)
*   Blurred, mid-motion barista (between counter and customers)
